summary: AN ORDINANCE establishing a City program providing for elderly utility credits to billings for Water, Sewer and Solid Waste utility services for certain low-income elderly persons; authorizing the Department of Human Resources to promulgate regulations and administer said program, establishing certain positions in the Department of Human Resources, fixing compensation and making appropriations from the Water, Sewer and Solid Waste Utility Funds, and defining offenses and fixing the penalties therefor. (See C.F. 279732 and C.B. 96152)
